<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grippli Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2818) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've trained with weapons ideally suited to marshes and dense forests. You are trained with [blowguns](/Weapons.aspx?ID=66), [hatchets](/Weapons.aspx?ID=27), [scythes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), [shortbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77), and [composite shortbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75). You also gain access to all uncommon [grippli](/Traits.aspx?ID=264) weapons. For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial grippli weapons are simple weapons, and advanced grippli weapons are martial weapons.

<title level="2">Grippli Weapon Familiarity leads to...</title>
[Grippli Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2830), [Grippli Weapon Innovator](/Feats.aspx?ID=2823)
name: Grippli Weapon Familiarity
